competitors.name: Autodesk
competitors.notes: Major competitor in CAD software with AutoCAD and other design tools

competitors.name: Pro/ENGINEER competitors
competitors.notes: Various lower-cost CAD vendors that emerged in the mid-1990s challenging PTC's market position

competitors.name: MatrixOne
competitors.notes: PLM software competitor focused on product lifecycle management

context: PTC Inc. is a industrial software company focused on CAD, PLM, IoT, and augmented reality for manufacturing. Windchill PLM platform growth.
